chunks.title: Legacy: COBOL batch extract
chunks.body:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
PROGRAM-ID. SUMSALES.
PROCEDURE DIVISION.
READ SALES-FILE AT END GO TO FINISH.
PERFORM UNTIL EOF = 'Y'
  ADD SALES-AMOUNT TO TOTAL
  READ SALES-FILE AT END MOVE 'Y' TO EOF
END-PERFORM.
FINISH. DISPLAY TOTAL. STOP RUN.

chunks.title: Legacy: VB6 form with globals
chunks.body:
Dim conn As Object
Dim userId As String
Private Sub Form_Load()
  Set conn = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection")
  conn.Open "DSN=Legacy;"
  userId = Text1.Text
End Sub
Private Sub BtnSave_Click()
  conn.Execute "INSERT INTO Logs(UserId, Note) VALUES('" & userId & "','clicked')"
End Sub
